item.description:
A bunch of people are getting together on Friday, at the Derryfield to see the band "mugsy", diane R. is organizing, and I am a "more than likely" attendee.

The band starts at 9:30, and we're meeting about 8:15. 

Dress is casual, and there's dancing and frolicking on outside deck as well as inside.

Hope to see you there...susan
item.how_to_find_us: tables to the left as you come in...

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Party at the Derryfield in Manchester with band "mugsy"
